How many people are affected by neurofibromatosis type 2 ?,"Neurofibromatosis type 2 has an estimated incidence of 1 in 33,000 people worldwide.",GHR,neurofibromatosis type 2
What are the genetic changes related to neurofibromatosis type 2 ?,"Mutations in the NF2 gene cause neurofibromatosis type 2. The NF2 gene provides instructions for making a protein called merlin (also known as
